item.title: Flight Compartment and Instrument Lighting System

remarks.para: Individual lights may be inoperative provided remaining lights are:

numlitem.para: Sufficient to clearly illuminate all required instruments, controls, and other devices for which it is provided,
Positioned so that direct rays are shielded from flight crewmembers eyes, and
Lighting configuration and intensity is acceptable to the flight crew.

placard.para: Placard near appropriate light: "LIGHT INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
